column2: "I have been discussing my students with my fellow instructors. I'm ashamed to admit they have influenced me."
"Though I may be acting as an instructor, I intend to resume my activities as an ARKS operative."
"That said, I am looking for someone with whom I can partner when I make my return to the front line."
"I wonder, would you be interested? If you can show adequate ability, I will trust you to watch my back."
